Package opengrok.auth.plugin

Class LdapAttrPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • opengrok.auth.plugin.AbstractLdapPlugin
      • opengrok.auth.plugin.LdapAttrPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuthorizationPlugin
    public class LdapAttrPlugin
extends AbstractLdapPlugin
    Authorization plug-in to check user's LDAP attribute against whitelist. This plugin heavily relies on the presence of the LdapUserPlugin in the stack above it, since it is using the Distinguished Name of the LdapUser to perform the LDAP lookup.
    Author:
    Krystof Tulinger
